description:
*** One of the best educational apps of the year - Apple (iTunes Rewind) ***
Now you can study SAT vocab by playing games. Need we say more? Featuring 9 addictive games designed to build essential SAT, PSAT & GRE vocabulary, our SAT Vocab app is perfect for students preparing for the SAT exam as well as adults continuing their lifelong quest to become wordsmithing wizards.

More than just a vocab builder, this app replaces the tedious flashcards used in traditional learning apps with rich and unique games. That means you’ll actually enjoy learning key elements of the SAT such as antonyms, context and spelling, all while boosting your ever- expanding vocabulary.

The app includes one free lesson for your enjoyment, and for players hoping to crack a seriously high SAT score, go ahead and upgrade to activate all 25 lessons. Before you know it, you’ll be flexing all sorts of vocabulary muscles you never even knew existed.

* PRESS *

The iPhone Mom
“What I really like about MindSnacks is how it lowers the stress level in our home.  Taking the SAT is a big deal but now study can be fun too.”

My College Guide
“You’ll improve on your spelling skills as well as context, antonyms, and more.” 

App Safari
"This app is not just your average, run-of-the-mill crash course... It includes complex exercises, challenges, and lessons that make the learning process fun and effective."

* FEATURES * 

-- 9 unique mini-games including one designed to teach antonyms
-- 500 SAT words and phrases to learn, practice, and master
-- Hand-illustrated image library and spoken audio clips to help memorize words
-- 25 lessons designed by SAT & PSAT test prep & writing experts (Upgrade required)
-- Personalized learning algorithms to maximize memorization, retention and SAT scores
-- Enhanced review mode lets you focus on current or previously mastered lessons
-- Additional quests & challenges to keep students motivated
-- Thoughtful curriculum may induce smiles and the occasional “booyah!!!” when achieving new high scores

* WHAT OUR (SUPER AWESOME) FANS HAVE TO SAY *

"I wish I could give this app 10 stars. I absolutely love it! It has been so helpful in studying, and I feel prepared for the SAT test. The games are interactive and force you to understand the vocabulary, instead of just memorizing it. I recommend this to anyone preparing for a standardized test or wishing to expand their vocabulary."

"This game is great! Such a fun and effective way to study for the SAT. I hate studying for vocab and can never memorize them, but this game is amazing and helps me so much!!"

* THE SCIENCE BEHIND MINDSNACKS *

At MindSnacks we like to keep it fun, but we’re serious about learning. That’s why the MindSnacks SAT vocab app includes 9 challenging games designed by Ivy League professors. Each game focuses on a different aspect of vocabulary building, creating a well-rounded learning experience that goes far beyond simple flashcards and word lists. 

Of course studying is only worth it if it works, so our unique algorithm reinforces the learning process using proven methods from the field of memory studies. Over time, the games adapt to your individual performance, selectively repeating material from the word lists with which you’ve previously struggled. In other words, as you learn more words, the app learns about you for a more effective learning experience.

Perfect for students preparing for the SAT, PSAT and GRE exam, or adults looking to expand their vocabulary, MindSnacks’ SAT Vocab app is like a helpful vocab tutor that goes where you go and teaches on your terms.

* SUPPORT *

For more information or support, please contact us at support@mindsnacks.com. Or if you’re feeling social, come on over and like, follow or tweet us.

VISIT US: mindsnacks.com
FOLLOW US: twitter.com/mindsnacks
LIKE US: facebook.com/mindsnacks
